DrinksMenu.title: TAGLIERE DI SALUMI E FORMAGGI PER DUE PERSONE
DrinksMenu.subTitle: Consists of: (Cheese Cuts - Caciotta Cheese with Truffle, Spicy aged Pecorino Cheese, Raw Milk Fontina Cheese, Sweet Taleggio) (Meat Cuts - Truffle Mortadella, Spicy Dry-Cured Italian Pork Meat, (Cinghiale) Italian Wild Boar Salami, Parma Ham)

DrinksMenu.title: Pinot Grigio DOC | Giacondi | Sicily
DrinksMenu.subTitle: The pleasant fruity flavor of ripe pear in the nose.

DrinksMenu.title: Chardonnay Giacondi | Veneto
DrinksMenu.subTitle: Bright yellow color, intriguing floral notes. Pleasantly dry on the palate.

DrinksMenu.title: Trebbiano D'Abruzzo DOC | Abruzzo | 2023
DrinksMenu.subTitle: Aromas of delicate floral notes like acacia or white blossoms with hints of green apple, pear, and lemon zest. Light to medium bodied.

DrinksMenu.title: Gavi DOCG Bollina | Serravalle Scrivia | 2023
DrinksMenu.subTitle: Aromatic and bright wine with good aromatic persistence and a pleasant acidic and mineral note.

DrinksMenu.title: Cavit Riesling | Trento | 2023
DrinksMenu.subTitle: Refreshing light floral notes with aromas and flavors of apricot, peach, and pear — known for its balanced sweetness and acidity. Light-bodied.

DrinksMenu.title: Sauvignon Blanc Asiottus | Emilia Romagna
DrinksMenu.subTitle: Nose reveals a delicate blend of elderflower and gooseberry with hints of green bell pepper and lime. On the palate, it's medium-bodied with good refreshing acidity, featuring tones of white-fleshed fruits and green tea. Blend of Chardonnay and Sauvignon Blanc grapes.

DrinksMenu.title: Pinot Grigio Blush Zonin | Veneto | 2015
DrinksMenu.subTitle: Delicate and fine aromas with floral and fruity notes.

DrinksMenu.title: Rosé Santa Cristina Giardino | Sangiovese | Toscana | 2021
DrinksMenu.subTitle: An intriguing and pleasant nose that offers floral and fruity notes of pink grapefruit, wild strawberries, and ripe apples, balanced with crisp freshness and a savory finish.

DrinksMenu.title: Prosecco DOC Rosé Brut Luna | Glera | Veneto
DrinksMenu.subTitle: Aromas of citrus, melon, almond, honey, and strawberry accompanied with floral notes.

DrinksMenu.title: Pinot Grigio Rosé San Vigilio | Lombardy | 2021
DrinksMenu.subTitle: Lovely, light coppery pink color. Appealing lightly aromatic nose with red currant and cherry notes. Crisp palate with strawberry and peach fruit characters leading to a fresh and juicy finish.

DrinksMenu.title: Stil Rosé DOC Santa Margherita | Lombardy | 2021
DrinksMenu.subTitle: The delicate pink color leads you to floral fragrances and fruity notes of orange with hints of lychee and ginger.

DrinksMenu.title: Manzoni Moscato Bottega Rosé | Veneto
DrinksMenu.subTitle: The aroma of roses and fruity notes of cherry, raspberries, ripe citrus fruits, and final spicy notes of sage.

DrinksMenu.title: Rosé Brut Gold Bottega | Pinot Noir | Veneto
DrinksMenu.subTitle: Nose of peach and summer berries with a palate that is fresh and crisp, with floral notes and flavors of strawberry and peach.
